WorkItem.Description:
I had problems running a release build of a project using FW1FontWrapper as a static library. In the FW1 project properties->configuration properties->c/c++->code generation->runtime library, the setting was "Multi-threaded (/MT)". I believe it should be "Multi-threaded DLL (/MD)". I hope this saves someone the time it took me to figure out.

Thanks for the project! Having fun with it, and will possibly be using in college instruction.
